title: Renovation Almost Completed
content: The renovation of the offices on the 3rd floor will soon be completed. Then our font-end team will move back to their offices.

title: New Department
content: From next month, Carrot-Tech will have a new department which will be focusing on Java development, their office is located in 2.48.

title: New Director
content: After 2 rounds of election, our business team will have a new director. Mr. Smith, congratulations on your successful election for the new director.

title: Completed Project
content: Congratulations to our front-end and back-end teams! You guys did an amazing job! Our client is so happy with the end result. The project of Delivariety has been successfully completed!

title: New Job Vacancies
content: Our management team will have 2 vacancies in two months, it will be welcomed if any employee can reference some competent candidates to join Carrot-Tech.

title: A New Office in Berlin
content: As Carrot-Tech expands, we will soon have a new office located in Berlin, we are moving towards our goal pretty well, thanks to every hard-working employee.
